circa 1830 to 1880 This collection includes contracts, specifications, and public notices for various public improvement projects in Brooklyn throughout the period circa 1830 to 1880, including paving and repairing streets, repairing and installing lampposts, renovating City Hall, and building cisterns, among others. Most of the materials are from the Brooklyn Street Commissioners, while others are from the Brooklyn Common Council and its various committees. A0063

Immediate Source of Acquisition

Conditions Governing Use
The materials in this collection are in the public domain.
Related Materials
Center for Brooklyn History holds the following related materials:
- Brooklyn Common Council register, 1894-1901 (1978.165)
Scope and Contents
This collection includes contracts, specifications, and public notices for various public improvement projects in Brooklyn throughout the period circa 1830 to 1880, including paving and repairing streets, repairing and installing lampposts, renovating City Hall, and building cisterns, among others. Most of the materials are from the Brooklyn Street Commissioners, while others are from the Brooklyn Common Council and its various committees.
